register.name: FPSCR
register.description: Provides floating-point system status information and control.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Negative condition flag. This is updated by floating-point comparison operations.

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Zero condition flag. This is updated by floating-point comparison operations.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Carry condition flag. This is updated by floating-point comparison operations.

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Overflow condition flag. This is updated by floating-point comparison operations.

bitField.name: QC
bitField.description: Cumulative saturation bit, Advanced SIMD only. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that an Advanced SIMD integer operation has saturated since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: AHP
bitField.description: Alternative half-precision control bit:

bitField.name: DN
bitField.description: Default NaN mode control bit:

bitField.name: FZ
bitField.description: Flush-to-zero mode control bit:

bitField.name: RMode
bitField.description: Rounding Mode control field.

bitField.name: Stride
bitField.description: It is IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED whether this field is RW or RAZ.

bitField.name: Len
bitField.description: It is IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED whether this field is RW or RAZ.

bitField.name: IDE
bitField.description: Input Denormal exception trap enable.

bitField.name: IXE
bitField.description: Inexact exception trap enable.

bitField.name: UFE
bitField.description: Underflow exception trap enable.

bitField.name: OFE
bitField.description: Overflow exception trap enable.

bitField.name: DZE
bitField.description: Division by Zero exception trap enable.

bitField.name: IOE
bitField.description: Invalid Operation exception trap enable.

bitField.name: IDC
bitField.description: Input Denormal cumulative exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Input Denormal exception has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: IXC
bitField.description: Inexact cumulative exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Inexact exception has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: UFC
bitField.description: Underflow cumulative exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Underflow exception has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: OFC
bitField.description: Overflow cumulative exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Overflow exception has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: DZC
bitField.description: Division by Zero cumulative exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Division by Zero exception has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: IOC
bitField.description: Invalid Operation cumulative exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Invalid Operation exception has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

register.name: SPSR_abt
register.description: Holds the saved process state when an exception is taken to Abort mode.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.N on taking an exception to Abort mode, and copied to CPSR.N on executing an exception return operation in Abort mode.

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.Z on taking an exception to Abort mode, and copied to CPSR.Z on executing an exception return operation in Abort mode.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.C on taking an exception to Abort mode, and copied to CPSR.C on executing an exception return operation in Abort mode.

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.V on taking an exception to Abort mode, and copied to CPSR.V on executing an exception return operation in Abort mode.

bitField.name: Q
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.Q on taking an exception to Abort mode, and copied to CPSR.Q on executing an exception return operation in Abort mode.

bitField.name: IT_1_0
bitField.description: IT block state bits for the T32 IT (If-Then) instruction. See IT[7:2] for explanation of this field.

bitField.name: J
bitField.description: RES0.

bitField.name: IL
bitField.description: Illegal Execution state bit. Shows the value of PSTATE.IL immediately before the exception was taken.

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for parallel addition and subtraction.

bitField.name: IT_7_2
bitField.description: IT block state bits for the T32 IT (If-Then) instruction. This field must be interpreted in two parts.

bitField.name: E
bitField.description: Endianness state bit.

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: SError interrupt mask bit.

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: IRQ mask bit.

bitField.name: F
bitField.description: FIQ mask bit.

bitField.name: T
bitField.description: T32 Instruction set state bit. Determines the AArch32 instruction set state that the exception was taken from.

bitField.name: M_4
bitField.description: Execution state that the exception was taken from.

bitField.name: M_3_0
bitField.description: AArch32 mode that an exception was taken from.

register.name: SPSR_fiq
register.description: Holds the saved process state when an exception is taken to FIQ mode.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.N on taking an exception to FIQ mode, and copied to CPSR.N on executing an exception return operation in FIQ mode.

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.Z on taking an exception to FIQ mode, and copied to CPSR.Z on executing an exception return operation in FIQ mode.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.C on taking an exception to FIQ mode, and copied to CPSR.C on executing an exception return operation in FIQ mode.

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.V on taking an exception to FIQ mode, and copied to CPSR.V on executing an exception return operation in FIQ mode.

bitField.name: Q
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.Q on taking an exception to FIQ mode, and copied to CPSR.Q on executing an exception return operation in FIQ mode.

bitField.name: IT_1_0
bitField.description: IT block state bits for the T32 IT (If-Then) instruction. See IT[7:2] for explanation of this field.

bitField.name: J
bitField.description: RES0.

bitField.name: IL
bitField.description: Illegal Execution state bit. Shows the value of PSTATE.IL immediately before the exception was taken.

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for parallel addition and subtraction.

bitField.name: IT_7_2
bitField.description: IT block state bits for the T32 IT (If-Then) instruction. This field must be interpreted in two parts.

bitField.name: E
bitField.description: Endianness state bit.

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: SError interrupt mask bit.

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: IRQ mask bit.

bitField.name: F
bitField.description: FIQ mask bit.

bitField.name: T
bitField.description: T32 Instruction set state bit. Determines the AArch32 instruction set state that the exception was taken from.

bitField.name: M_4
bitField.description: Execution state that the exception was taken from.

bitField.name: M_3_0
bitField.description: AArch32 mode that an exception was taken from.

register.name: SPSR_irq
register.description: Holds the saved process state when an exception is taken to IRQ mode.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.N on taking an exception to IRQ mode, and copied to CPSR.N on executing an exception return operation in IRQ mode.

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.Z on taking an exception to IRQ mode, and copied to CPSR.Z on executing an exception return operation in IRQ mode.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.C on taking an exception to IRQ mode, and copied to CPSR.C on executing an exception return operation in IRQ mode.

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.V on taking an exception to IRQ mode, and copied to CPSR.V on executing an exception return operation in IRQ mode.

bitField.name: Q
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.Q on taking an exception to IRQ mode, and copied to CPSR.Q on executing an exception return operation in IRQ mode.

bitField.name: IT_1_0
bitField.description: IT block state bits for the T32 IT (If-Then) instruction. See IT[7:2] for explanation of this field.

bitField.name: J
bitField.description: RES0.

bitField.name: IL
bitField.description: Illegal Execution state bit. Shows the value of PSTATE.IL immediately before the exception was taken.

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for parallel addition and subtraction.

bitField.name: IT_7_2
bitField.description: IT block state bits for the T32 IT (If-Then) instruction. This field must be interpreted in two parts.

bitField.name: E
bitField.description: Endianness state bit.

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: SError interrupt mask bit.

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: IRQ mask bit.

bitField.name: F
bitField.description: FIQ mask bit.

bitField.name: T
bitField.description: T32 Instruction set state bit. Determines the AArch32 instruction set state that the exception was taken from.

bitField.name: M_4
bitField.description: Execution state that the exception was taken from.

bitField.name: M_3_0
bitField.description: AArch32 mode that an exception was taken from.

register.description: Holds the saved process state when an exception is taken to Supervisor mode.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.N on taking an exception to Supervisor mode, and copied to CPSR.N on executing an exception return operation in Supervisor mode.

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.Z on taking an exception to Supervisor mode, and copied to CPSR.Z on executing an exception return operation in Supervisor mode.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.C on taking an exception to Supervisor mode, and copied to CPSR.C on executing an exception return operation in Supervisor mode.

bitField.name: V

bitField.name: Q
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.Q on taking an exception to Supervisor mode, and copied to CPSR.Q on executing an exception return operation in Supervisor mode.

bitField.name: IT_1_0
bitField.description: IT block state bits for the T32 IT (If-Then) instruction. See IT[7:2] for explanation of this field.

bitField.description: RES0.

register.name: SPSR_und
register.description: Holds the saved process state when an exception is taken to Undefined mode.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.N on taking an exception to Undefined mode, and copied to CPSR.N on executing an exception return operation in Undefined mode.

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.Z on taking an exception to Undefined mode, and copied to CPSR.Z on executing an exception return operation in Undefined mode.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.C on taking an exception to Undefined mode, and copied to CPSR.C on executing an exception return operation in Undefined mode.

bitField.name: Q
bitField.description: Set to the value of CPSR.Q on taking an exception to Undefined mode, and copied to CPSR.Q on executing an exception return operation in Undefined mode.

bitField.description: IT block state bits for the T32 IT (If-Then) instruction. See IT[7:2] for explanation of this field.

bitField.name: J
bitField.description: RES0.

bitField.name: IL
bitField.description: Illegal Execution state bit. Shows the value of PSTATE.IL immediately before the exception was taken.

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for parallel addition and subtraction.

bitField.description: IT block state bits for the T32 IT (If-Then) instruction. This field must be interpreted in two parts.

bitField.description: SError interrupt mask bit.

tcf:enumItem.description: NaN operands propagate through to the output of a floating-point operation.
tcf:enumItem.name: NaN_operands_propagate_through_to_the_output_of_a_floating_point_operation

tcf:enumItem.description: Any operation involving one or more NaNs returns the Default NaN.
tcf:enumItem.name: Any_operation_involving_one_or_more_NaNs_returns_the_Default_NaN

tcf:enumItem.description: Flush-to-zero mode disabled. Behavior of the floating-point system is fully compliant with the IEEE 754 standard.
tcf:enumItem.name: Flush_to_zero_mode_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the IDC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the IDC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the IDC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the IXC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the IXC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the IXC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the UFC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the UFC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the UFC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the OFC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the OFC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the OFC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the DZC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the DZC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the DZC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the IOC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the IOC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the IOC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected
